media:group.media:title: Thrive Main Theme (Jazz Remix)
media:group.media:description:
https://revolutionarygamesstudio.com/

The upcoming Thrive release features a new art gallery feature, so I thought it was about time to realise my dream of creating a jazz remix of the Thrive Main Theme to act as light background music. It was pretty fun, and I didn't go crazy on the details to keep it quick and light. Hope you find it as infectiously rhythmic as I do.

Art by Roseae.

For my many subscribers who may be new to Thrive, see the above link for more information.
